mapper.select:
SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_TP_CD , T1.CNTR_TEMP_SAVE_DTM , T1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM , T2.PRTNR_NO , T3.PRTNR_KNM --, 센터명 추가 필요 FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_PRTNR_REL T2 ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T3 ON T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD WHERE 1=1
AND T1.CNTR_NO != #{cntrNo} /* 현재 계약번호 제외 */
AND T1.CNTR_CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 계약자 고객번호 */ AND T1.CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD NOT IN ('60','90','99') AND SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_TEMP_SAVE_DTM,1,8) >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 5, 'YYYYMMDD') AND T1.PRR_RCP_CNTR_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.COPN_DV_CD , T1.CIK_VAL , T1.CST_NO , T1.SEX_DV_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_EDU', 'SEX_DV_CD', T1.SEX_DV_CD) AS SEX_DV_NM , T1.BRYY_MMDD , T1.BZRNO , T1.CST_KNM , T1.LNF_DV_CD , T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T1.MEXNO_ENCR , T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T3.LOCARA_TNO , T3.EXNO_ENCR , T3.IDV_TNO , T1.ADR_ID , T1.CMN_SFK_VAL -- 세이프키 , T2.SAP_EMPNO -- SAP사원번호 , T2.EMP_DV_VAL -- 직원구분값 , T2.EMP_TP_VAL -- 직원유형값 , T2.DEPT_CD -- 부서코드 , T2.CO_CD -- 회사코드 , T4.LOCARA_TNO , T4.EXNO_ENCR , T4.IDV_TNO , CASE WHEN T5.RNADR IS NOT NULL THEN T5.RNADR WHEN T5.LTN_ADR IS NOT NULL THEN T5.LTN_ADR ELSE '' END AS ADR , CASE WHEN T5.RDADR IS NOT NULL THEN T5.RDADR WHEN T5.LTN_DTL_ADR IS NOT NULL THEN T5.LTN_DTL_ADR ELSE '' END AS ADR_DTL , CASE WHEN T5.NEW_ADR_ZIP IS NOT NULL THEN T5.NEW_ADR_ZIP WHEN T5.OLD_ADR_ZIP IS NOT NULL THEN T5.OLD_ADR_ZIP ELSE '' END AS ZIP FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_EMP_BAS T2 -- 임직원의 경우 ON T2.BRYY_MMDD = T1.BRYY_MMDD AND T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND T2.MEXNO_ENCR = T1.MEXNO_ENCR AND T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO = T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO AND T2.FNM = T1.CST_KNM LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_CTPLC_BAS T3 ON T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.CST_CTPLC_OJ_DV_CD = '03' AND T3.CST_CTPLC_OJ_REFK_VAL = T1.CST_NO AND T3.CTPLC_TP_CD = '05' AND T3.HIST_END_DTM = '99991231235959' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_CTPLC_BAS T4 ON T4.CST_CTPLC_OJ_REFK_VAL = T1.CST_NO AND T4.CTPLC_TP_CD = DECODE(T1.COPN_DV_CD, '1', '04', '2', '05') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T4.HIST_STRT_DTM AND T4.HIST_END_DTM AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.FST_RGST_DTM = (SELECT MAX(FST_RGST_DTM) FROM TB_CUBS_CST_CTPLC_BAS WHERE CST_CTPLC_OJ_REFK_VAL = T4.CST_CTPLC_OJ_REFK_VAL AND CTPLC_TP_CD = DECODE(T1.COPN_DV_CD, '1', '04', '2', '05') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN HIST_STRT_DTM AND HIST_END_DTM AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 ON T5.ADR_ID = T1.ADR_ID AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT GRY_CD AS CODE_ID , GRY_NM AS CODE_NAME FROM TB_PDBS_GRY_BAS WHERE 1 = 1 AND EXPSR_YN = 'Y' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND AGE = CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(#{age}) >= 20 THEN 20 ELSE TO_NUMBER(#{age}) END
ORDER BY GRY_CD, AGE

SELECT T1.STNRD_YR , T1.STNRD_MN , T1.STNRD_DY FROM T_CMY_CALR_M T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMZ_HLDY_M T2 ON T2.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_EDU' AND SUBSTR(T2.HLDY_APPY_START_DTM, 1, 8) = T1.STNRD_YR || LPAD(TRIM(T1.STNRD_MN), 2, '0') || LPAD(TRIM(T1.STNRD_DY), 2, '0') AND T2.HLDY_USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_EDU'
AND T1.STNRD_YR = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, +1), 'YYYYMM'), 1, 4)) AND T1.STNRD_MN = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, +1), 5, 2))
AND T1.STNRD_YR = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4)) AND T1.STNRD_MN = TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2)) AND LPAD(TRIM(T1.STNRD_DY), 2, '0') > SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) AND T2.HLDY_UID IS NULL
ORDER BY T1.STNRD_YR, T1.STNRD_MN, T1.STNRD_DY
SELECT CASE WHEN ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM TB_SSCT_PRR_BIZ_BSDT_BAS WHERE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN RCP_STRTDT AND RCP_ENDDT ) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS RESR_ORDR_YN FROM DUAL

SELECT T1.CST_NO FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 ON T2.PRTNR_KNM = T1.CST_KNM AND T2.SEX_DV_CD = T1.SEX_DV_CD AND T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND T2.MEXNO_ENCR = T1.MEXNO_ENCR AND T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO = T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO AND T2.BRYY_MMDD = T1.BRYY_MMDD AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 ON T3.OG_TP_CD = T2.OG_TP_CD AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T2.PRTNR_NO AND T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T3.OG_TP_CD IN ('E01', 'E02') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 ON T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 ON T3.CST_KNM = T2.PRTNR_KNM AND T3.SEX_DV_CD = T2.SEX_DV_CD AND T3.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND T3.MEXNO_ENCR = T2.MEXNO_ENCR AND T3.CRAL_IDV_TNO = T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO AND T3.BRYY_MMDD = T2.BRYY_MMDD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.CST_NO = #{cstNo} WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('E01', 'E02') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 ON T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T3 ON T3.CST_KNM = T2.PRTNR_KNM AND T3.SEX_DV_CD = T2.SEX_DV_CD AND T3.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND T3.MEXNO_ENCR = T2.MEXNO_ENCR AND T3.CRAL_IDV_TNO = T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO AND T3.BRYY_MMDD = T2.BRYY_MMDD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.CST_NO IN ( SELECT CST_NO FROM TB_CUBS_HSHD_BAS WHERE HSHD_NO = ( SELECT HSHD_NO FROM TB_CUBS_HSHD_BAS WHERE 1 = 1 AND CST_NO = #{cstNo} ) ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('E01', 'E02') AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT WK_YM , RCP_STRTDT , RCP_ENDDT , CNFM_STRTDT , CNFM_ENDDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CNFM_STRTDT, 'YYYYMMDD') + 2, 'YYYYMMDD') AS LRN_STRTDT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FST_RGST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD') AS RGST_DT , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(FST_RGST_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS RGST_DTM , FST_RGST_USR_ID AS RGR FROM TB_SSCT_PRR_BIZ_BSDT_BAS WHERE 1= 1 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN RCP_STRTDT AND CNFM_ENDDT AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T1.CNTR_NO FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_CST_REL T2 ON T2.DTL_CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.DTL_CNTR_SN = 1 AND T2.CNTR_CST_REL_TP_CD = '20' AND T2.CST_NO = #{lrnrCstNo} INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 ON T3.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T1.SELL_PRTNR_NO AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T1.SELL_OG_TP_CD AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T4 ON T4.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T4.OG_ID = T3.OG_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO = ( SELECT DGR3_LEVL_DG_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ L1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ L2 ON L2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND L2.OG_ID = L1.OG_ID AND L2.PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} AND L2.OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} AND L2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE L1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND L1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') IN (SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM, 1, 6), SUBSTR(T1.CNTR_CNFM_DTM, 1, 6)) AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_SSOP_PSPC_CST_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS T2 ON T2.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
AND T2.BZRNO = T1.BZRNO
AND T2.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO AND T2.MEXNO_ENCR = T1.MEXNO_ENCR AND T2.CRAL_IDV_TNO = T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO
WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = #{session.prtnrNo} AND T1.ICHR_OG_TP_CD = #{session.ogTpCd} AND T1.PSPC_CST_ID = #{pspcCstId} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T2.BLD_CD FROM TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS /* 계약기본 */ SET CNTR_CST_NO = #{cntrCstNo} /* 계약고객번호 */ , COPN_DV_CD = #{copnDvCd} /* 법인격구분코드 */ , SELL_INFLW_CHNL_DTL_CD = #{sellInflwChnlDtlCd} /* 판매유입채널상세코드 */ , SELL_OG_TP_CD = #{sellOgTpCd} /* 판매조직유형코드 */ , SELL_PRTNR_NO = #{sellPrtnrNo} /* 판매파트너번호 */ , CNTR_TP_CD = #{cntrTpCd} /* 계약유형코드 */ , CNTR_NAT_CD = #{cntrNatCd} /* 계약국가코드 */ , CNTR_PRGS_STAT_CD = #{cntrPrgsStatCd} /* 계약진행상태코드 */ , CST_STLM_IN_MTH_CD = #{cstStlmInMthCd} /* 고객결제입력방법코드 */ , PRR_RCP_CNTR_YN = #{prrRcpCntrYn} /* 사전접수계약여부 */ , CNTR_TEMP_SAVE_DTM = #{cntrTempSaveDtm} /* 계약임시저장일시 */ , CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM = #{cntrRcpFshDtm} /* 계약접수완료일시 */ , CNTR_STLM_FSH_DTM = #{cntrStlmFshDtm} /* 계약결제완료일시 */ , CNTR_CNFM_APR_AK_DTM = #{cntrCnfmAprAkDtm} /* 계약확정승인요청일시 */ , CNTR_CNFM_APR_DTM = #{cntrCnfmAprDtm} /* 계약확정승인일시 */ , CNTR_CNFM_DTM = #{cntrCnfmDtm} /* 계약확정일시 */ , CNTR_CAN_DTM = #{cntrCanDtm} /* 계약취소일시 */ , CNTR_CAN_RSON_CD = #{cntrCanRsonCd} /* 계약취소사유코드 */ , CNTR_PRGS_STAT_MO_CN = #{cntrPrgsStatMoCn} /* 계약진행상태메모내용 */ , DSB_GUR_TP_CD = #{dsbGurTpCd} /* 지급보증유형코드 */ , CNTR_INFLW_PH_DV_CD = #{cntrInflwPhDvCd} /* 계약유입경로구분코드 */ , PSPC_CST_ID = #{pspcCstId} /* 가망고객ID */ , CNTR_CH_RCP_ID = #{cntrChRcpId} /* 계약변경접수ID */ , DCEVDN_DOC_ID = #{dcevdnDocId} /* 증빙서류문서ID */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /* 계약번호 */

UPDATE TB_SSCT_CNTR_REL SET VL_END_DTM = #{vlEndDtm}
WHERE VL_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND BASE_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND CNTR_UNIT_TP_CD = '010' AND CNTR_REL_TP_CD = '30' AND CNTR_REL_DTL_CD = '311' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
